text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ―Trainer-san! Listen to this!
One day, while walking around the school grounds, Smart Falcon ran up to me with a smile on her face.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: You see, this time, during the Sports Competition, Falco is going to be part of the Cheer Dance group☆
The 『Inter-disciplinary Sports Comeptition』. A race that's held twice a year at Tracen Academy, it's a big event that always brings in lots of spectators.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ――Right! The one where lots of spectators from outside the school attend, that Sports Compeition!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: If I can dance in front of lots of spectators, I wonder if they'll become Falco's fans～, Ehehe♪
But, when I found her again as the day was ending……

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Go- Go-, Fight O-…… Let's Go-, Fight O-……
I was going to call out to her but, then I noticed she was talking to another Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Haaa～…… it would have been nice to join the Cheer Dance, huh?

text_block_list.name: Dirt Aptitude Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Yeah…… never thought I would end up as a Flag-bearer though……

text_block_list.name: Dirt Aptitude Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: I have dirt aptitude, and flag-bearer aptitude…… I always get told that. If I want to get attention, then this won't work……
……It seems like rather than being Dancers in the Cheer Squad, they were selected as flag-bearers.
While I was trying to think of words of encouragement―

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ……but, since it's already been decided, we just have to do our best. For now, let's keep on practicing!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: So just like this…… and this! And then…… like this, and this!
The flag fluttered in the evening sky. Despite how heavy the pole looked, the flag was swung about quite nimbly. I could understand why they were chosen.
After their flag-waving practice had ended, I decide to talk to her when she was alone.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Huuu～, that took a lot of strength…… I'm so tired……

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ―Waaah! Trainer-san!?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Uuu～…… I really wanted to show off the sparkly and cute dancing of Falco though～……
choice_data_list: But, this might be a valuable experience

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ……you think so? Even though it's a flag, do you think they might still think 『It's wonderful』?
―And so, with a little bit of anxiety, the Inter-disciplinary Sports Competition began.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Go- Go-! Fight O-! Let's Go-! Fight O-!
Smart Falcon stood next to the breathtaking dancers while waving her flag. When she moved to the center, she didn't let the opportunity pass―

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Go- Go-!! Fight Oーーー!!!! Let's Go-!! Fight Oーーーー!!!!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: That flag girl is amazing……! She looks so enthusiastic!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Yeah, she's waving that flag so energetically……! It's almost like she's become one with that flag……!
……is what I thought, but―

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Ooooh-! The dancers are awesome too! Look at that pyramid they're making, normally you can't do something like that!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Waaa, you're right～! Everyone's got such bright smiles! So cool and so cute, I don't think I can take my eyes off them～♪

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Haa～…… 『The way you waved that flag was amazing, and it made the dancers stand out!』 was what someone told me……

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ……as expected, it looks like the dancers won out.
choice_data_list: But they could tell you worked hard!
But they could tell you worked hard!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: But but, they won't remember my face! The only thing I'll make them remember is the flag～～……!!
Even if she works hard, results won't show up immediately. The path to Top Umadol would probably be a long one……
